actions.action: Navigate to the shelf to be deleted
Click "Delete" link in the shelf actions
Click "Confirm" button in the confirmation dialog
Verify alert message "Shelf successfully deleted" appears
Verify user is redirected away from deleted shelf page
actions.expectedResult: User is no longer on the deleted shelf page

actions.action: Verify shelf no longer appears in shelves listing
actions.expectedResult: Shelf is removed from shelves list
